body:
I'm sorry to say that Nemo is officially leaving. It's such a shame to see such a wonderful member of the community leave. I'm sure he would want to thank certain members of the community for a wonderful time including his team. 

I would personally ally like to thank Nemo for all the great times he's given me and a lot of other people. He was a joy to play with. 

Rip the kf King

Goodbye Nemo!

title: Bye Nemo!

replies.body: If you don't mind me asking, why wasn't Nemo able to make this himself?

replies.body: If it isn't worth his time, then you don't need to make one. Stop making these threads, this is the final warning.
